attributes.action: wear a homberg hat for one week in return for sponsorship for Children in Need
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister bears an uncanny resemblence to Tony Hancock. This resemblence should be used to attract funds for Children in Need.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
